Literature.Title: NOVEL ANTI-MICROBIAL PEPTIDOMIMETIC COMPOUNDS AND METHODS TO CALCULATE ANTI-MICROBIAL ACTIVITY
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Venugopal D, Bhonsle JB

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:86.8% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=3µM),Mycobacterium fortuitum ATCC 110(MIC=30µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 43223(MIC=1µM)
